Player History
Injured on 8/24/1966 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/26/1967 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Injured on 5/21/1967 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for full season...
Injured on 7/31/1968 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 6 weeks...
Released by Houston on 4/1/1969...
Drafted in 2nd round, 27th overall pick, by Baltimore in 1972...
Injured on 8/28/1972 with a Broken Hand, out for 7 weeks...
Released by Baltimore on 4/26/1979...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/10/1980 to a 2-year deal worth $1,740,000 per year...
Released by Cleveland on 6/2/1980...
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Baltimore in 1985...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1991, off Tom Glavine (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/1991, off John Smoltz (OAK)...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1991, hitting .632 with 0 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 1993...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1994, hitting .483 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against Oakland on 6/23/1994...
Was selected to the 1994 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 1994...
